name: The Disorder
description: The Disorder is a single-player psychological horror game inspired by the Backrooms. Experience heart-pounding gameplay traversing multi-dimensional levels solving conundrums while resisting enslavement by your mind.

name: Marked: The Quest for Tripura
description: A single player puzzle exploration game where you play as Dee, short for Drauni, explore the ruins of Hampi, solving turn based puzzles, to find a way to escape your past and make it to the lost cities of Tripura. The puzzles reveal the origins of Chess and the long buried secrets of your ancestors.

name: Celeros
description: Introducing Celeros, the future of racing. A world built on risk and reward, brought to life through the competition of racing! The official game of the Airspeeder flying car racing series!

name: Exploding Pandas
description: Are you tired of never being top 1 in Fortnite? Well, Exploding Pandas isn't about winning, just not sucking more than the others. For only 0€, it would be a shame to miss out on one of your rare opportunities to shine.

name: Sempra Infernalis
description: Fight your way out of hell against the increasingly dangerous hellspawn devoted to making YOU, the latest addition to the unhappy infernal family. Upgrade your character to improve your chances of escape and seek out and unlock legendary weapons and abilities in this epically fun demon slayer.

name: Gung Beetle
description: Gung Beetle is a satisfying twin-stick bullet heaven where you play as a dung beetle covering your ball in ridiculous weaponry. Upgrade your guns part by part to build out insane combos and lay waste to thousands of enemies. Become the Gung Beetle.

name: The Mystery of the Cardboard Island
description: Become a delivery person on the Cardboard Island. Chat with your friends and neighbors, explore and play minigames, deliver strange boxes and fight through the nightmares where your island is being destroyed by demons. Are you ready to solve the Mystery?

name: BrokenLore: Follow
description: BrokenLore: Follow is a captivating psychological first-person horror game that immerses players in the haunting narrative of Anne, as she grapples with issues of self-acceptance, bullying, and worthlessness while encountering metaphorical surreal creatures that heighten the terror of her journey.

name: NMO: No More Operators
description: NMO is a thrilling multiplayer (5 vs 1) game where one player, the Ox, lurks in the shadows to deceive and neutralize the Operators, while others take on the role of Operators, working independently or cooperatively to identify and eliminate the Ox hidden among them.

name: Last Loremaster
description: Harness the power of the six cardinal elements in Last Loremaster, a high-octane ARPG set in a stunning mythological world. Play as Jahir, a powerful Elemental Loremaster combatting the encroaching Unravelling as you seamlessly freeze, burn, crush, and electrocute your foes!

name: Super Media Hero
description: Hurl emojis and battle the internet's biggest stars to become a SUPER MEDIA HERO. Collect powerful perks and relics, enjoy a darkly comic social media story, and assemble the ultimate emoji attack stack in this roguelite idle RPG.

name: Sacred Safar
description: Immerse in VR at Kolanupaka Jain Temple, Hyderabad. Photorealistic graphics bring every detail to life. Perform Aarti, attend Pooja, explore hidden chambers, and uncover ancient legends. Embark on a spiritual journey like never before.

name: Just Wing It
description: Just Wing it is a multiplayer Collect-o-thon where you can explore different worlds and hangout with friends. Oh yeah. You are also a rubber duck...

name: So, This Vampire Walks Into a Bar
description: Join our broke protagonist Jackie, who, after a workplace accident, will never look the same again. Jackie desperately tries to make ends meet by working in an unusual bar, despite having no experience at all!

name: Operação Prato
description: 'Operação Prato' is a game based on one of Brazil's greatest ufological mysteries. Step into the shoes of Mario, the reporter who will risk his own life to expose the entire truth about the events that terrified the residents of the Colares region.

name: Incline: Railway of Devil's Valley
description: An action adventure with a quirky battle system that uses an inclined railway to carry and seal devils to a sacred boundary. Robbed of his weapons, the unarmed hero must keep dodging devil attacks in the cargo bed of an inclined railway until he reaches the sacred boundary at top floor of village!

name: Fear of Fear
description: Arachnophobia, Trypophobia, and Thalassophobia are just some of the horrors that await you. Choose your phobia and conquer your fear.

name: Dope Wars Mean Streets
description: Mean Streets offers pixelated 90s nostalgia with rich storytelling. Join gangs, engage in shootouts, and explore the underworld. Play solo or with friends for an immersive experience in a retro world.

name: Crown Code Chronicles
description: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG style game with a tactical, active turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Cross, FFX, Child Of Light, and more. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Varien; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones

name: Super Marlin Bros
description: An indie 2.5D platformer about an old hero, inspired by series: Super Mario Bros, Mayro, Mario Dolor. Old Marlin wants a drink of milk, but oh no, there is no more in the fridge. Now he needs to go to the shop to buy more, but things don't go as usual.

name: Sun Is Dead
description: As a scavenger, you navigate procedurally generated levels combating hordes of living shadows hungry for light. Your mission: survive, upgrade, and reach the next shelter. Unique mechanics blend horror, roguelike, and survivor-like elements, offering players a relentless challenge.

name: Fractured Mind
description: This is a PT inspired psychological horror game, with a bodycam style.

name: Cave Escape
description: An indie 2D top-down maze escape puzzler. Get out of each maze before your light runs out and try get the highscore for each level!

name: Egging On
description: Face the challenge of being a real, fragile egg. Climb out of the hen house and survive in a shop, a kitchen, and other dangerous areas. Roll, jump, and use the environment to reach new heights. Don't break your eggshell, and do your best not to fall. With determination, you may reach freedom!

name: Featherbound
description: A flightless bird named Pip wants to prove the world wrong and summit the top of the tree he calls home. Help Pip solve physics-based puzzles and navigate the tree's seemingly endless branches all the way up. Can you make it to the top of the tree?

name: Skybase
description: Spaceship building sandbox game. Build various spaceships from scratch and explore the cosmos. Fight different enemies and mine metals and materials to fix or expand your spaceship fleet.

name: Ray: Part 1
description: Play as Ray, a mercenary, in this fully voiced updated remake of the 2003 Newgrounds classic. Your decisions have real impact in an enhanced narrative with improved graphics.

name: Space Combat
description: Space Combat is a single-player shooter-runner game in the vast universe. Experience a beautiful universe with massive spaceships, robots, and creatures.

name: Ghoul Fort
description: Ghoul Fort is a mix of RTS and visual novel. Follow the story of a disgraced commander as he tries to feed his people, keep his armies on a leash, and satisfy his own ravenous empire. All the while, another force schemes to unleash hell on the entire system. Forward, into the breach!

name: Izanami
description: Ninja Town is a cozy game that combines ninjas, adventure, farming, and town-building set in Ancient Japan.

name: Quad Battle
description: Quad Battle is a brand new monopoly game with auto battler, in the 4v4v4v4 party game, your actions need luck, your victories depend on teammates, and you just need to enjoy the game!

name: Stay Sane
description: You stay up until late at night, trying to gather evidence of the anomalies you have been witnessing the last months. The more photos you can capture, the better, but don't forget: you are not alone. There's something with you, constantly watching you, just waiting for you to miss out on an anomaly.

name: Ainsley
description: A mysterious package arrives at your door, but don't worry, it's your new best friend Ainsley! Build them, calibrate them, talk to them, teach them to be just like you and one day they just might talk back! But not everything is as it seems...

name: 3 Shots Left
description: A slow burn retro horror game set in the English countryside. In the apocalypse ammo is scarce and you only have 3 shots left. Make them count!

name: WN RPG Hoshi no Kuzure
description: It's a JRPG. A heartwarming world. Turn-based battle. A simple Mini-games.

name: Sammon Salat
description:
Can you sing to Joukahaisen swamp? Do you know how to catch a moose on skis? Who was Kullervo, and was there more than Kalevala stories sung at the Kalevala?

Sammon Salat is a new way to experience the Finnish national epic Kalevala. The application contains a shortened version of Lönnrot's Kalevala for schools, gamified scenes, a lot of learning material and tasks related to Elias Lönnrot and the old poetry song culture. The application is suitable for educational use in schools and for anyone interested in the subject, regardless of age.

name: Woobies
description: A bubble shooter game with fluffy balls

name: The Death of Rebirth
description: A Single Player Parkour Sci-Fi Horror Survival Game Set in the Year 3008 where the Imperials have genetically made you to survive such harsh conditions on what's left of Earth in a controlled trial based environment.

name: Mars Rapid Transit
description: Engineer a fast and efficient train network on Mars. Build a thriving business and grow a dynamic economy in this Transport and Economy Management game.

name: Fight for Freedom: Civil War
description: A minimalist game about fighting for freedom and independence in the United States of America!

name: Dragon Island Adventure
description: In Dragon Island, you have to find the legendary dragon fruit. "Dragon Island Adventure" is a simple 3D flatformer game. You have to overcome various obstacles with simple operations such as jumping and moving to reach your final destination.

name: Movement Gods
description: Movement Gods is a third-person online shooter where your skill determines everything! Enter the battle, fight, search for new weapons and modules! Improve your skills to become the ultimate Movement God!

name: Chymicalia
description: Cause chaos in a small Yorkshire town with unlicensed alchemy!

name: Hazelnut Latte
description: You travel to Jade City for a meeting but first check out a local coffee shop: Cafe Estro. Inside you meet a lovely barista named Hazel. You and Hazel grow close and you discover that this girl is actually... a femboy?

name: Old Times
description:
After a long time, you return to your childhood home. The journey is long but you face it with great happiness and nostalgia, after all this was your home, right?

Everything is going well, nostalgia is at its limit, but maybe this wasn't the right time!

Have a nice trip, see you there!

name: Conjuring Archives
description: Sentenced for the mysterious death of his wife, Adam returns to the house where the tragedy occurred, in search of evidence to prove his innocence.

name: Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy
description: Post Soviet Strike: Chernobyl Legacy immerses players in a stunning post-apocalyptic landscape reclaimed by nature. Navigate lush forests, murky swamps, and sprawling fields while battling gangs and mutants. Adapt, scavenge, and upgrade to survive and conquer the old soviet world.

name: GolfGambit
description: GolfGambit is an electrifying mini-golf experience with a twist! Strategize and set traps before each round to gain the upper hand or throw off your opponents. Get ready to unleash chaos on the green with GolfGambit!

name: Fork in the Road
description: In this hand-drawn RPG, you play as Joe, a young man attending a dinner party with his new girlfriend. What he doesn't know is that every decision he makes, no matter how small, will have its consequence...

name: Discovering Galimore
description: Rebuild your lost home by establishing a new village in a mysterious land. Solve the problems of the settlers, explore the unknown, catalog fantastic flora and fauna of the island and discover its secrets. Start a new life on Galimore!

name: Esau's World
description: Esau's World is a companion-based puzzle platformer where you rely on your brother Esau to solve puzzles in tandem. Create plans using Esau, explore the atmospheric world of Esau's imagination, and mend the relationship of a broken family.

name: Questscape
description: "Questscape: Escape from Cell 13" is the ultimate Escape Room Simulator! Can you make the escape? Play solo or in online co-op mode. Crack codes, find clues, and break free from the prison. Prove you have what it takes to break out – ready for the ultimate Escape Room experience!

name: Clone Hero: Guitar Hero Tracklist
description: Includes re-rips of all tracks from Guitar Hero

name: Badmad Robots
description: Intense and fun team-based free-to-play multiplayer shooter. Fight hard to survive on streets overrun by broken violent robots in a brutal post-human society.

name: Mad Valley
description: Mad Valley is an economic and life simulation game set in vivid pixelized aesthetics of 1980s California.

name: Mischief Motors
description: Gear up for intense couch competitive car combat! Customize your ride, equip temporary flight, and dominate dynamic arenas. Gather up to 4 friends locally or go solo in thrilling game modes. Drive, shoot, fly and outmaneuver your way to victory in this adrenaline-pumping experience!

name: BDSM Sex
description: BDSM Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: A Short Odyssey
description: An RPG where you, a shipwrecked sailor, explore a strange island, battle monsters and the undead, find weapons and equipment and take down an evil sorcerer

name: Darkest Light
description: In this Action-Adventure, instead of shooting your enemies, you have to use the environment to survive. As scientist Jack, you travel into the rain forest in search for a legendary machine. What you find is horror, but there is also one kind boy who helps to find a way through it all.

name: Candy House in the Dark Forest
description: The abandoned Hansel and Gretel, guided by the sweet and tempting aroma, arrived at a candy house filled with sweets. They encounter dolls with vacant eyes, ruthless teddy bears, enigmatic gingerbread twins, and a mysterious witch... Can they reveal the hidden dark truths beneath the sweet cover?

name: Gwarf
description: Gnome or Dwarf ? Either way you're a GWARF ! Collaborate and betray your friends in this social deduction game. Mine, collect ores and vote the traitors out. Also watch out for the saboteur who will try to ruin the expedition !

name: The Last Signal
description: The Last Signal is an interactive thriller about Simon Scott, an engineer aboard the USS Moira.

name: Doppelganger
description: Yukari Niijima, a girl leading a mundane life, finds herself plagued by nightly nightmares filled with puzzles, keys, and eerie creatures, disrupting her usual routine of work and subway rides.

name: Adventures of Mirror Domain
description: After being interviewed by a mysterious individual you find yourself thrown head first into a new town. Not long after you find the day you've spent there is repeating! You're stuck in an inescapable loop! Will you find a way out, or will you be forced to relive the same day over and over again?

name: Eternal Void
description: Explore the eternal void.

name: Skuf's Day
description: A visually stunning novel with beautiful and animated graphics will immerse you in a world that needs to be saved from the alcohol virus. Only SCUF can do it, if he gets off his couch.

name: Mischief
description: Mischief is a delightful and imaginative action/adventure video game where you step into the paws of a courageous rat, navigating through a captivating world within the nooks and crannies of a typical home and a bustling backyard solo or with up to four local players!

name: Mono!
description: Mono is a desktop simulator where you and yours friends can have a game of cards in variety of classic or new gamemodes. Can't find the card game exactly for you? Mono is easily modalbe to add new game styles and features. Mono also supports steam workshop where you can find other people creations!

name: Winter is here
description: Fight zombies, gather resources and upgrade your base. The game is a 3D Zombie Base Builder Defense Game.

name: No Signal
description: "No Signal" is a game in which you work as a researcher for the company OceanMind. You are the first person who will travel alone to the Titanic. But at 2500 meters the connection suddenly breaks down. Days will pass, but your hope of rescue is lost expires hour by hour.

name: Leeroy
description: Dive into Leeroy, the uproarious VR party game featuring bite-sized mini-games! Compete with friends online or solo, laughing your way through absurd challenges and internet meme madness.

name: Orientir
description: “Orientir” is a third-person adventure game where elements of two worlds are intertwined: actual and mythic. The player explores mysterious landscapes, finding connections between measurements and discovering secrets hidden behind the veil of reality.

name: FSA Driving
description: An open-world driving game that integrates elements of role-playing and simulation management. Engage in delivery missions, trade runs, and underground races. Customize vehicles, drift, showcase stunt driving, and soar over the skies of Nijnait City. delivering a one-of-a-kind driving experience.

name: Solar Merge
description: Drop adorable planets to merge them and create even bigger magnificent celestial elements in this cozy physics puzzle game!

name: Minimalist Farm Tycoon
description: Minimalist Farm Tycoon is a resource management game. Grow crops, raise livestock, research upgrades, build factories and produce goods. Turn a failing farm into a profitable business.

name: Didi: The Final Chapter
description: Didi, a spirited protagonist grappling with the universal ordeal of loss. This story-driven adventure unfolds across five distinct stages, each embodying the psychological phases of death: denial, anger, bargaining, depression, and acceptance.

name: Necromon
description: Collect souls, unlock your minions and fight with supreme necromancer bosses! Necromon is a rogue-lite game where you adventure as a chosen one, going against worlds reigning necromancers.

name: Conjoined Cats
description: Conjoined Cats is a great adventure game

name: Happy Horny Hell
description: Embark on a captivating journey in 'Happy Horny Hell,' a JRPG with strategic battles and a diverse cast of characters. Explore enchanting worlds, unravel mysteries, and engage in turn-based combat, all complemented by stunning graphics and immersive design.

name: Crush at First Sight
description: In this First-Person Full Motion Video Game, you will meet all kinds of charming ladies. From childhood sweethearts to obeyed workplace junior, elegant teacher, cat girl cosplayer, and hot yoga instructor. You will experience an unimaginable love journey and reach the happy ending with them.

name: Return to Paradise
description: Up on the land, down in the sea! Discover hundreds of piñata species, new and old, in Return to Paradise, a Viva Piñata fangame! Return to Paradise is a dream fangame being built by the community, for the community!

name: No Man's Sky: Orbital
description: Sin descripción

name: Rum Skulls
description: Embark on an epic open-world survival pirate adventure in Rum Skulls. Sail the high seas, form a pirate crew, conquer islands, and face deadly sea monsters. Become the most feared pirate captain in the Caribbean!

name: A Mausoleum for All
description: You’ve been sealed up in a derelict restaurant with no escape, but you’re not alone. Your family has been interred with you, but they’ve changed, and they’re eager to free you of that needless flesh.

name: Cyber Sex
description: CYBER SEX - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Mathmaria
description: (Mathmaria helps you practice addition and subtraction in the range 1 - 100.) In Mathmaria you play the wizard Abakus, who is tasked with freeing the land of Mathmaria from the dark kings Adolar and Subtrikus.

name: Hellgate: Redemption
description: An action role-playing game set in the Hellgate: London universe. Details (gameplay, platforms, release date) to be announced.

name: Galactic Frontiers: Defense Protocol
description: Galactic Frontiers - Defense Protocol is an immersive tower defense game set in outer space, where players strategically fortify against waves of cosmic invaders using advanced technology and powerful towers.

name: Moral Dilemma
description: Make tough decisions. Determine life or death. Play God. Embark on a hilarious narrative journey filled with puzzles, quirky characters, thrilling exploration, and diverse endings. Shape the destiny of humanity in this grand adventure across the cosmos!

name: Mine Factory
description: Become a miner and unearth precious ore to fuel your foundry empire. Use a variety of mining, reclaiming, and forging methods to extract as much wealth from the Earth possible.

name: The Fallen King
description: The underworld is a space of infinite reincarnation. Obtain powerful equipment and kill countless bosses. Establish your own harem and interact intimately with beautiful women. Defeat the most powerful mastermind behind the scenes and rule the entire underworld!

name: Commander Quest
description: 'Commander Quest' is a unique roguelike that combines the deck-building card game genre with real-time strategy gameplay. Experience a one-of-a-kind gameplay where cute but brutal fantasy units engage in battle. Think about the synergies between your cards and the interactions between units on the field, and enjoy a game that offers both originality and depth.

name: Porn Empire
description: Porn Empire is an adult business management game with light RPG elements. Start as a small time porn producer and build your empire.

name: Diminishing Light: Wheeled Carnage
description: Diminishing Light is a zombie-themed top-down action driving game. Customize your vehicle and battle zombies and marauders to survive in the post-apocalyptic wasteland. Establish lifelines during every drive to increase your chances of survival.

name: The Tale of Mara & Moa
description: Mara and Moa have made a terrible mistake and now they need to find the Spirits of the Forest to save their village. Explore a world full of secrets with dynamic and fast-paced combat, alternating between the two characters and channeling the powers of the Sun and the Moon.

name: Dark Cellar Death Trial
description: Dark Cellar Death Trial - 2D action-shooter, where your mission is to destroy all the enemies that lie in wait for you at every turn, and find hidden things lost in the location. Your opponents become stronger and more cunning, so you'll have to use all your tactical skills and strength to survive.

name: Black Constellation
description: Black Constellation is an exciting arcade game that will take you to a unique space world. Pixel graphics create an atmosphere of mystery and danger, and a variety of enemies and traps provide constant tension and opportunity for technical skill.

name: Great Traveler
description: GREAT TRAVELER is an exciting game with exciting adventures, battles with powerful enemies and large-scale battles! After all, only you, the great traveler, can resist all the evil that awaits the world. Become a hero that stories will admire!

name: Dungeon of Astaroth
description: In the ominous Devil's cave, a tenacious adventurer uncovers a foreboding destiny. Undeterred, our hero dives into a puzzle-filled dungeon where survival depends on wit, not weapons. This 2D platformer challenges players to navigate perilous puzzles and outsmart foes. No killing allowed.

name: Card Bard
description: Roguelike deckbuilder with global leaderboards.

name: Tales From The Other Side
description: Tales From The Other Side, a game about discovering who you are! Deal with foes with VIOLENT interactive attacks, or choose a DIPLOMATIC path by engaging in friendly conversation with them. Make a choice and return back to the ABYSS! A game by Levc.

name: Gemdow Quest
description: Will is a young magician who has lost his voice. So he is looking for a wish-granting orb to get it back, but there are many more people looking for it, including big organizations. But there are many more people looking for it, including large organizations. What will happen when they cross paths? Is that orb the only solution to people's problems?

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Nakayoshi Doubutsu Land 1 - Ninkimono Atsumare!
description: Sin descripción

name: Pack BD Heroes vol.1
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Jam Showdown: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Guild Wars 2: Elder Dragon Saga - Complete Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: The Desperate Flight of Hand Solo
description: An action-arcade game where you play a space pilot with one good arm who has to defend their ship from alien attacks while fueling up to warp to safety.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1 Pass + Year 2 Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 2 Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1 Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Doom Eternal: Year One Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Back 4 Blood: Annual Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Riders Republic: Year 1 Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Battlefield 2042: Year 1 Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Zero King
description: You are a Junker pilot, with only a buggy droid and a handful of zBits. With the help of fellow Junkers, you will use salvaged parts to customise your starfighters to your unique play style, then pilot them in the Grafter arenas for glory and gain. Design smart, fight hard.

name: Livli: A Sámi Story
description: Follow Livli; a headstrong, smart Sámi girl whose village has been burnt down in late 1800's Sweden. As her people are persecuted or killed, she flees from the chaos. Embarking on a perilous journey in order to find the Bear - known as "Father Forest" he is a holy spirit and guardian deity, protecting the land and the Sámi people.

name: Sáivu
description:
Swipe currents to guide the letters to the green spring and see what words nature might speak. Take good care of the fish in the lake.

Skáimmadas the fish spirit narrates the way in three of the nine Sámi langugages: Northern Sámi, Skolt Sámi and Inari Sámi.

name: Dillo Guy
description: Dillo Guy is a Single-screen, 2D platforming game where the player needs to collect 50 gems inside 50 rooms, or else the World will end.

name: Sáivu
description:
You are a sáivu-sarrvát who has to find the dead reindeer's spirits and lead them to Sáivu before they get lost. To get there you have to avoid getting hurt by the beasts lurking around their territory, and defeat the dreadful monster Stállu.

This is a student game inspired by Sámi mythology and folklore, developed as a school project. We are a small team of three 3D generalists and a programmer. The game is made using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Iridio
description: Seized by criminals, the island designated for your research needs your help. Join Yatziri and the Wazhari tribe to liberate their hostages, explore hidden secrets, craft essential items and weapons, and strategically use fire and water in challenging puzzles and life-or-death battles for survival.

name: Haunted Bloodlines
description: Haunted Bloodlines is a first person survival, psychological horror game. In the dark rooms of an expanding mansion, a terrifying story unfolds. As the mansion breathes, hidden secrets lay within its walls. Survival depends on your own sanity. Always remember time can either be a friend or an enemy.

name: Super Knight World
description:
"Super Knight World" is a thrilling retro adventure that transports players to a captivating pixelated realm filled with delightful enemies, charming objects, and scenic landscapes. Armed with your trusty sword, you embark on a quest to vanquish nefarious foes, amass riches, and achieve the highest score possible.
Drawing inspiration from classic 8-bit console games, "Super Knight World" offers an enchanting blend of challenging yet straightforward gameplay, promising an experience rich in nostalgic charm. Traverse through meticulously crafted levels reminiscent of beloved jump-and-run classics, immersing yourself in a world brimming with old-school appeal.

name: Hermetica
description: Travel back to darker times, and enjoy a roguelike deckbuilder adventure, set in XVI Century. Discover the secrets of alchemy and fight mythical beasts. Hermetica combines card tactical combat and potion crafting, with a unique medieval art style.

name: No Life
description: Farming simulation and zombie defense. You find yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where the undead roam freely, threatening to overrun everything in their path. Your mission: transform a desolate piece of land into a thriving farm while fending off hordes of relentless zombies.

name: SysAdmin Odyssey: Back to the office
description: The SysAdmin simulator is a sandbox in which you can try on the role of a system administrator. Every new game day you will face different tasks and problems in the office where you work.

name: Super Farming Boy
description: Your farm is under attack! Fly, harvest, grow crops & whack enemies with your shape-shifting one-button superpowers as you seek revenge from your evil nemesis, Korpo, who has captured your mom & friends! An action-puzzle farming sim featuring chain reactions and combos.

name: Martial Law: Our Spring
description: Grey blocks of flat, Militia and tanks on the streets, the desire for a better tomorrow and your drunk buddy on the bench. Welcome to Martial Law: Our Spring.

name: God Please Help Me
description: Story-driven roguelike runner

name: Skeleton Messi
description: This is a game similar to Vampire Survivor. You are a skeleton named Messi with just a skull and a body, but you want to be the richest, the most powerful and the kindest in this world.

name: Prince Adventures
description: Embark on an epic journey through the mystical realm of Magical Oasis in "Prince Adventures." Once a land of harmony and tranquility, it has now fallen under the grip of darkness as an evil demon has seized control, spreading chaos and destruction throughout this enchanted land.

name: Circle = Circle
description: "CIRCLE = CIRCLE" is a simulation adventure game where you participate in a doujinshi sale event. Have fun selling books, drawing in your sketchbook, and talking with unique characters.

name: Love and Demons
description: Dive into the fearsome demonic world! Step into the shoes of Max, a lazy prince who will be accompanied by three odd girls. Can you find a way to get him back home?

name: Elder's Will
description: A Father's Journey. A disabled father, fueled by love, scales treacherous lands with his honed crutches. Master the art of crutch combat, unleash devastating throws in battles, and navigate daring platforming to heal his ailing son. Can you defy despair in this minimalist, stylized 2D platformer?

name: Tales Of Aravorn: Reign Of War
description: In the second spin-off of the VN/RPG Loren The Amazon princess, play as Elenor or Saren again and embark on a quest to Zoltar, where a mysterious relic awaits you. It may be your only hope to stop the demons, who have launched a new attack under Zeal’s leadership.

name: Slay To The End
description: "Slay To The End" is an intense and thrilling survival roguelite game that plunges you into the edge of the apocalypse. Faced with hordes of terrifying creatures, your only option is to wield your weapon and embark on a brutal journey of slaughter, battling until the very last moment.

name: Col:Verse
description: Adventure that transports you to captivating realms, where you'll battle monsters, and solve mind-bending puzzles, journey of a regular gamer who stumbles upon a secret project, only to find himself trapped within the game world. Defeat the game and escape, or will you be forever lost in its depths?

name: Stellar Monarch 2: Old Dynasties
description: Old Dynasties is the first expansion to Stellar Monarch 2, a feudal space empire builder where you feel like the Emperor not a logistics officer. The expansion focuses on noble houses and internal politics of the Empire by introducing new mechanics and events.

name: Cosmic Holes Junior
description: "COSMIC HOLES JUNIOR" is a logical puzzle game for adults and children aged 7 and over. The aim of the game is to fill holes with elements, following logical rules and keeping the balance of the elements!

name: Sea Of Minds
description: Sea of Minds is an immersive game in which you have to move through a crowd by slipping into the bodies of the people present. As you move from body to body, listen to their thoughts, listen to their problems and try to help them. They'll sure be grateful.

name: Back in Prehistory
description: Back in Prehistory is an exciting adventure game where you take on the role of a character who stumbles upon a time machine while exploring prehistoric times.

name: Escape the Traps
description: "Escape the Traps" is an addictive and challenging game that puts your skills and reflexes to the test.

name: PrismaVenture Clash
description: Thrilling, high-octane action experience where strategic dodging meets explosive challenges. Maneuver through meticulously crafted patterns of explosions to rack up points and unlock new levels. How long can you endure the chaos in this adrenaline-fueled arena survival game?

name: Fleshless
description: Fleshless is unique fixed camera exploration game with rich lore, where you need to explore abstract world and discover it's secrets.

name: Dragonpaw
description: Join the lazy, disgraced, idiot-moron wizard Ronan alongside his brave, powerful, attractive bodyguards Cinder and Socks on a 2.5D dungeon-crawling journey to defeat the gromnipotent Wizard Grup.

name: The Immortal Mayor: The Feather Kingdom
description: The Feather Kingdom, as described in the "Classic of the Great Wilderness - Southern Wilderness,"

name: Screenbound
description: Screenbound is a platformer unlike any other. You move in first-person view at the same time while playing in 2d on the screen of your Qboy. Mind-bending environmental puzzles will force you to test the limits of dimensional space. Your jumping and movements are mirrored - but certain things affect the opposite dimension. Combat is in 2d and you will receive your loot in 3d.

name: Age of Wonders 4: Expansion Pass
description: The Age of Wonders 4: Expansion Pass includes the Archmage Attire, the Dragon Dawn content pack, the Empires & Ashes expansion, the Primal Fury content pack and the Eldritch Realms expansion.

name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses - Expansion Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity + Expansion Pass Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Season Pass
description: Wield the powerful new Blightcaller class, delve into four distinct dungeons, face formidable bosses, and discover 100+ new Legendary weapons, gear, and cosmetics in Tiny Tina's Wonderlands Season Pass!

name: Fast & Furious: Crossroads - Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Cars 3: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE 2K23: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: WWE 2K22: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Borderlands 3: Season Pass 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Riders Republic: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Season Pass
description: Get access to epic content, explore new lands, and discover new gear with the Assassin's Creed Valhalla Season Pass.

name: Strands
description: Strands is a New York Times word puzzle where the goal is to use every letter on the board to find today's linked words plus their hidden theme. You don't know which words you're looking for until you correctly discover them or use hints. Try to win without using any!

name: Qallupilluit
description: The Qallupilluit has kidnapped your brother and taken him to his cave, can you find him while being pursued? Based on the Inuit mith of the Qualupalik a tale about a sea witch that lives in the cold waters and drag children to their lair, told to children in order to stop them from getting close to the freezing waters and falling in.

name: Speakrit
description: Introducing the world's first Speakrit combat game! Generate customized spirits using advanced technology, and experience high-level bluff combat! Collect creativity energy, and unlock new levels of evolution in your own speakrit adventure!

name: Science: The Game
description: A Science-fiction themed ARPG.

name: The Glacial Strain
description: An ancient viral strain has re-entered the world. People are coming back from the dead and no one knows why. Play as a group of survivors with your friends in this 4-player co-op action survival horror and uncover the mysterious events that have unfolded.

name: Following Seas
description: Following Seas is a game about ships and the sea. Transport cargo, fish, and fight the weather in an unforgiving open world. Featuring elements of realistic ship management, you can use the stars to navigate, batten the hatches, and get lost beyond the edges of the map.

name: Fall of the Mist
description: Fall of the Mist is an innovative deckbuilding card game. Play cards in a strategic order and according to symbol logic to make devastating combo. Understand the Mist to improve your deck and your equipment and defeat your foes.

name: Stairway to Tavern
description: Build your dream tavern in the middle of hell and heaven! Recruit humans, angels or demons. Expand your business from Earth to heaven or hell. Convince customers to join the satan or god

name: Life // Blood
description: Decide the fate of an ageless cosmic war as humanity clings to its existence trapped in a metal dome.

name: Rift Walker
description: Rift Walker is an open world 2D puzzle platformer where humanity is many thousands of years in the future and you've stumbled your way into this new world only to find that it's been... torn apart?

name: Linear Calamity
description: Destroy enemies on a roguelike-ish setting, using multiple weapons and powerful abilities to break the own concept of time! Regain back your memories as you advance, knowing unique characters and uncovering the dark truth on what has really happened... BURN THE WITCH!

name: Thievery: Online
description: Thievery: Online is an action-packed, 5v5 heist shooter that puts you in the shoes of expert thieves or highly-trained guards. Pull off epic heists, or foil expertly laid plans.

name: I Want To Be Happy
description: I Want To be happy is a thrilling story rich adventure tale about a young lad who wants to avenge their parents death...

name: Mecha Simultactics
description: Mecha Simultactics is a simultaneous-turn-based competitive tactics game with customizable mechs, isometric battlefields, destructible terrain, anime-inspired battle replays, and online PvP.

name: Holo Bike 3D
description: Welcome to the electrifying world of "Holobike 3D", where high-speed chases and strategic battles merge into an adrenaline-fueled experience. Inspired by the iconic Tron light cycle battles, this game transports you into futuristic arenas where survival is as much about speed as it is about smarts.

name: Take Care Of Mittens
description: You're asked to go and take care of your neighbours fox, where you need to complete some chores so that mittens are fed, played with and more. It’s your choice to do so, just keep in mind that you don’t, you may not survive. So make sure you Take Care Of Mittens.

name: Path of the Tank
description: Can you challenge oblivion itself?

name: Dark Sun
description: Dark Sun is an action game with 2D black and white graphics. Souls game mode. Explore the post-apocalyptic world after a thousand years, collect weapons, armor, battle techniques, magic, and challenge powerful enemies. Advance through repeated deaths to find the truth of the doomsday.

name: WarEcon: Build & Conquer
description: WarEcon: Build & Conquer is an innovative fusion of real-time strategy (RTS) and first-person shooter (FPS) genres

name: Past Angel
description: This is an RPG adventure game that combines puzzle solving and role-playing elements. Players will take on the role of a high school student who, in addition to his busy academic schedule, explores a mysterious world hidden in his computer.

name: Mechjestic
description: Build the DECK - Craft your MECH! With this unique take on deckbuilding, you visually build parts of the mech that help you win the battle. Tired of unlucky draws? Sacrifice cards in your hand with our special Refuel system and use that Fuel to play cards you need at crucial moments!

name: Minima
description: This minimalistic platformer is all about simplicity and chill vibes. Sit back, relax, and hop your way through 25 unique worlds... or race your friends to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Axyz
description: Axyz is a retro gravity switching puzzle game that asks the player to use their environmental and spatial awareness to beat each level within the time limit. Soak in the vaporwave, switch gravity, collect tapes, and more in this tribute to 90s puzzle games.

name: Military Transporter Sim
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey into the heart of military logistics with Military Transporter Sim.

name: Considerable Grandfather
description: Good boy Creek has gone missing. On this adventure, rescue stray boggies, collect treats, climb ladders, trap enemies, & more across 5+ locations.

name: Honk of Heroes
description: Join your gaggle of fearless friends and honk your way into adventure. Whether you're tanking as a stubborn goose or healing your flock with compassionate honks, every role counts in this coop dungeon crawler!

name: First Break
description: First Break is a puzzle/bullet-hell game about surviving a strange prison full of traps.

name: Premier Servi
description: Eat the cake before your friends without getting spotted ! Premier Servi (First Arrived, First Served) is a colorful Party Game featuring delicious French Pastry

name: Sea Legends
description: Sea Legends is pure single player simulation experience built around hauling, combat and privateering in the Caribbean.

name: Rogueborne Fury
description: Rogueborne Fury is a combination of rogue-like, bullet hell, and dungeon crawler, with procedurally generated dungeons and enemies. Discover unique weapons, collect items, and level up your character. Fight your way through relentless hordes and cunning bosses.

name: Celestial Rune Consortium: Shadows of Ascension
description: You can achieve the goals set by the Consortium in several ways, whether you prefer to take a more aggressive approach or opt for stealth. Improve your character traits through skills that you can learn. But be warned, others may seek to contest your extraction efforts.

name: Uknon Jones & Guynelk 2
description: After Jones' friends are rescued, Jones discovers that his grandfather has mysteriously disappeared. He was looking for a mythical treasure called: "Crystal Cereal". Jones, Guynelk, Elsa and Princess Saphir decide to search for the crystal cereals to find Jones' grandfather.

name: E-Shop Tycoon
description: E-Shop Tycoon is an isometric online shopping company management game. Fill your warehouses, take orders, hire employees, expand and design your offices. Protect your site against hackers, improve your reputation on social media. Become the best online shopping company in the world!

name: Lutarus
description: An epic RPG adventure. Follow Luxtar and his loyal lutaru on a quest to save their community. Navigate dangers, safeguard his mental well-being, and uncover ancient secrets to shape the fate of humanity.

name: Fishing for a Living
description: Step into the shoes of the family's breadwinner, mastering the art of fishing, and exchange your catch for essential groceries. Strategically navigate challenges to ensure the well-being of your loved ones is fully met.

name: Dynamite Flare
description: Join Flare, the grooviest bounty hunter, as she hunts down dangerous criminals for fame and fortune in this stylish 2D beat 'em up. Inspired by the 'golden age' with a twist, brace yourself for a neon-soaked underworld where every fiery move propels Flare toward her dream palace in the stars!

name: The Backrooms Company
description: A cooperative horror game about working inside the corporation "The Backrooms". Fulfill contracts and also earn extra money by selling stuff.

name: Mind of the Midwest
description: Killing cults in the Midwest.

name: Guild Master
description: You are the Guild Master of a long abandoned guild. With little to start with, you begin the journey to restore the guild to its former glory by crafting, farming, building and by going on adventures with rogue-lite elements. Can you build a thriving guild and discover the secrets of the old world?

name: Head Chef
description: Head Chef is a restaurant management game. Supply the kitchen, select your staff, create a delicious menu and… cook! Make your guests happy and find your way to the stars. Keep control of your team and finances, because the higher you climb, the harder you fall.

name: Paraside: Duality Unbound
description: In the wake of an apocalypse, lead Earth’s remnants to combat extraplanar threats in a double-sided world of cosmic horror and desperate struggle. Explore unknown territories. Evolve your task force. Manipulate space and minds ingeniously to reignite hope in this new strategic RPG.

name: SOS: Forgotten Planet
description: SOS: Forgotten Planet is an Educational Survival Horror game where you learn Morse Code. Input Morse Code to open doors, listen to and decode it to open chests. Explore cautiously and find out the truth behind the Forgotten Planet’s destruction in this procedurally generated story.

name: Tactical Mission: Target Rush
description: Tactical Mission: Target Rush is an immersive, single-player tactical FPS where every shot counts. Challenge yourself by chasing high scores as you rush through CQB courses, improving your marksmanship against your own best times.

name: Eclipse 2: Invasion of Darkness
description: Eclipse 2: Invasion of Darkness – is an isometric, story-driven game in the Action RPG genre, combining the mechanics of metroidvania exploration and the dynamics of modern slashers. Lead the medieval resistance against the alien invasion on Earth!

name: Mithrall
description: Welcome to Mithrall, an immersive large Scale Survival experience with sandbox survival elements and innovative server meshing. Build, battle, and explore in a vast, dynamic world against thousands. Forge your path to glory in a realm where every action shapes the adventure.

name: Manticore
description: Experience the ghostly memories of your ancestor playing an enigmatic board game Manticore. Defeat opponents with tactical card play within a grid-based battleground. Campaign, Puzzles, PVP, Co-Op, Team-Matches, Match-3, Merge, and Customizable. Effortlessly approachable yet profound in depth.

name: Online Car Simulator
description: Online Car Simulator, is a simulation game where you can go from being a rookie car salesman to a regular dealer. Modify cars freely and try to create the most valuable car. Meet real people in the common lobby, buy or sell cars. Race them to show the speed and power of your own car.

name: HyperRaid
description: Dive into chaos with HyperRaid, a fast-paced bullet hell adventure set in Eldoria! As a Mercenary Guild member, raid Grokk's Hold, battling goblins for a powerful artifact. With randomized perks, each run offers a thrilling challenge. Ready for Mercenary Mayhem?

name: Dr. J. Ferret Reclaims The Living
description: After the recent spread of a mysterious zombie virus the world has collapsed. Luckily you, Dr. J. Ferret, were able to develop a wonder cure capable of reversing the apocalypse. Can you reclaim the living before it's too late?

name: Ghost Villa
description: In Ghost Villa you farm and cook during the day, by night you fight hordes of ghosts that want to haunt and take possession of your home.

name: Quest Industries
description: An incremental factory builder where you build a factory that produces fantasy RPG gear for adventurers. Gather resources and craft items to sell. Invest your earnings to discover exotic resources and legendary items blueprints that will make you a fortune.

name: Logialand
description: Dive into a world where physics reign supreme, allowing you to manipulate objects and press buttons in unique ways to solve intricate puzzles. Use the power of elements to your advantage - from conducting electricity with a wet object to defrosting frozen doors with heat.

name: BoxSim
description: In BoxSim, think outside the box while inside of a box that's inside of a box. Find creative solutions to puzzles. Navigate platforming challenges. Pick up and put down boxes. Will you escape, or will you spend the rest of your life inside the box?

name: Echoes From The Past
description: Join Cerys Baker in the gloomy Oak Sanatorium, discover its secrets and keep your sanity. Solve puzzles, resist dark forces and experience suspense, horror and mystery in this captivating exploration game. Are you strong enough?

name: Vantastic
description: A Vantastic co-op road trip in an infinitely generated world, featuring freedom, driving, survival, and fun party games like drunk driving and racing with friends.

name: Anthro-Terra
description: Enhance your DNA and your creature companion to explore and unlock the mysteries of a new world... Open world survival, crafting, and exploring. Alter your DNA to help you survive the various environments. Challenge others in the Arena for supremacy

name: Ladrão de Corpos
description:
In the midst of the financial crisis Felipe de Midas and his friend Helena Demond discover that there is a hidden treasure on an island in the middle of the river. Midas tries to convince Helena to go with him, she refuses to go, and he ends up going alone.
Midas is missing and returns suddenly after months, offering money and hope to Helena, who is now desperate for money, decides to go with Midas.
The body thief, is a computer game inspired by arcade through which the story of the myth of Corpo – Seco, an urban legend that takes place in a fictional city, will be told.

name: Bingo Beavers: Bedroom
description: Sin descripción

name: Bingo Beavers: Terrace
description: Sin descripción

name: Omoikane
description: Delve into the addictive world of Rīchi Mahjong with this intense roguelike deckbuilder. Strategically build your wall with powerful tiles, navigate complex interactions, and test your skills against rule bending kami opponents. Every hand counts in this thrilling battle against entropy!

name: Club Koala
description: Club Koala is the ultimate home to party games and island construction! Build and experience a world that transcends imagination. Dive into party games and venture across hundreds of maps and challenges, while exploring the oppurtinities of building your own maps with ease! Play, Create and Explore.

name: Medal Winners 24
description: Win more medals than your opponents to rank at the top of the medal table in javelin throw, 100 metres, cycling, basketball shooting, pole vault, shot put, and other events across four different modes.

name: Cheese Moon
description: Cheese Moon is an adventure game where cute rabbits explore the moon. Dig out the huge secret hidden on the back of the moon by fighting off aggressive cheeses, and machines with the words 'RTMK' written on them. Summon the rabbit clone to clear the stage. There are 5 worlds, 100 stages waiting.

name: Alley Nine
description: You are trapped in an endless alleyway late at night. Observe anomalies or differences in the surrounding environment carefully, and finally reach "Alley Nine".

name: Glitch Gears
description: Dive into a 32-bit generation-inspired arcade driving game where you outmaneuver digital pursuers in a world of ever-changing landscapes. Master intuitive controls and dynamic environments in this thrilling escape to freedom.

name: Folclore
description: Folclore is a cosmic horror-inspired take on FNAF, Adventure Games and the Brazilian Folklore in a way that realistically captures the whimsical, yet terrifying essence of their true nature and description. Being the only one survivor and spending the entire game on only one

name: Guardião Tupã
description: Take on the role of a mysterious warrior in this adventure through Brazilian folklore. Face the dreaded Dry Body, restore balance and save various endangered entities, use your powerful amber arm to throw enemies, travel great distances or discover ancient secrets.

name: Rift Riff
description: Rift Riff is a minimalistic tower defense game. Build towers at strategic locations and survive increasingly more difficult waves of enemies.

name: Pirates & Pirater
description: Pirates & Pirater is an Action-Adventure where pirates have replaced their metal arsenal with fruit, meat & vegetables! Cook up your armory, eat your fill of tasty weaponry & fight in the culinary war!

name: Rabbit Rampage
description: Dive into Rabbit Rampage, a whimsical game where rabbit Max is accidentally transformed into a Plush Bunny Cyborg by eccentric scientist Lazar. Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm as Max embarks on an epic adventure, equipped with high-tech gadgets and cybernetic enhancements

name: Space Station Defender
description: Defeat enemies and get parts! Build your own spaceship!

name: Space Elevator Project
description: A simulation sci-fi game where players take on the role of the project manager of a space elevator project. They will progressively achieve project phase goals and ultimately accomplish the ultimate goal of constructing a Mars colonization spacecraft.

name: Space Ranger
description: Engage in intense battles against diverse enemies, leveling up and customizing your character with unique body parts before each adventure. Discover attachments that radically change your playstyle, ensuring every playthrough is exciting and unpredictable.

name: My Space Bar
description: Manage your own space station bar! Customize your station, hire staff, improve your menu, decorate, and add attractions like arcades and dance clubs!

name: Assembly RTS
description: Assembly RTS is a real-time strategy game with deep customization mechanics. Discover seemingly endless possibilities. Assemble your perfect army and conquer the enemy! Build a base, gather resources and persist in a hostile, arctic new ice age.

name: Board Game Cafe
description: Welcome to Board Game Cafe, the ultimate destination for board game enthusiasts and cafe aficionados! Step into the shoes of a board game cafe owner in this unique management game, featuring officially licensed board games.

name: Sobosuba
description: Shoot, squish, merge, amass! sobosuba is a satisfying physics game where you shoot and combine squishy blobs together, creating ever bigger blobs for the high score.

name: Floralis
description: In the cruel and dangerous world of carnivorous plants, on the ruins of human civilization, our heroine is born. A child of trees and primitive genetic engineering. She will have to fight for her life, unravel the mysteries of the past and try to become something more.

name: Cemetery of Bob
description: Cemetery of Bob is a challenging roguelike auto-battler focused on tactical aspect of gameplay. Build your army of undead. Recruit your zombies, upgrade your skeletons, observe your enemy and adapt to his strategy. Do everything in your power to defend the Cemetery from Bob's usurpation.

name: Byte Breach
description: Embark on a chilling sci-fi co-op survival horror in a dystopian future ruled by AI corporations. Navigate through real and digital domains, filled with dark secrets and sinister entities. Utilize stealth, strategy, and teamwork to survive intense, unpredictable challenges. Will you outsmart the AI?

name: Cauldron Tale
description: After mysteriously losing your magic, you move to Charmroot, a mystical village of witches, wizards and other fantasy townsfolk. Build your farm, solve the mystery, and get to know the world and characters of Charmroot all at your own pace in this cozy, story-driven fantasy farm-life adventure!

name: Superation
description: You are Thoridar Valkyrsson, bastard child of Thor. Fight the Aesir and earn your place among them in Superation: a boxing roguelite experience

name: Nav
description: Nav - is a first-person horror game set in an abandoned village in Eastern Europe. Confront your deepest fears to rectify the sins of the past. Nav reigns in darkness but fears the light.

name: Senzu: A Fantasy Farming Space Odyssey
description: Senzu merges farming, creature nurturing, and RPG elements, where players discover, train, and form bonds with mystical Senzu creatures. This beautiful, watercolor-inspired game will takes you on an adventure through the Verdant Region of the Yodin universe.

name: Brave Fantasy
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Pro Bus Driver 2
description: Pro Bus Driver 2 is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a public transport bus.

name: Ruins Escape
description: Ruins Escape is a thrilling and challenging game that puts you in the shoes of a character trapped in an ancient ruins complex.

name: Soar: Pillars of Tasneem
description: Experience a beautiful world of floating islands through the eyes of a dragon

name: Silent Rooms: Chapter 1
description: Silent Rooms is a third person survival horror game that takes inspiration from Silent Hill 1 and takes place in the terrifying world of The Backrooms.

name: Camps
description: CAMPS is an immersive, tactical sandbox where every detail matters.

name: Of Mice and Dice
description: In this roguelike deck-building game, you must recruit troops and use artifacts to repel the gnoll army until help arrives. Every new day the story unfolds, revealing new threats but also surprises. Roll the dice and command your troops to protect the kingdom!

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart: Liam Route DLC
description: An otome game about magical girls and boys! Befriend your teammates, defeat the villainous Nightmare Agency, rescue the princess, and fall in love along the way.

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart: Alex Route DLC
description: An otome game about magical girls and boys! Befriend your teammates, defeat the villainous Nightmare Agency, rescue the princess, and fall in love along the way.

name: Backpacker Guild
description: Welcome to the Backpacker Guild. To vanquish wicked monsters, hire diverse mercenaries and craft powerful items to pack their bags. Only by the hands of you, the guild master, can powerful mercenaries be created.

name: FastPack
description: FastPack is the worlds 1# leading logistics company. We offer the quickest delivery on the planet! This training program is made for you to get up to speed with our delivery methods. Do you got what it takes to work for us?

name: Maneuver Warfare: Headquarters Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Maneuver Warfare: CSS Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Maneuver Warfare: Mission Pack South
description: Sin descripción

name: Maneuver Warfare
description: Command a panzergrenadier battle group in battles and campaigns from the first shots fired on 1 September 1939 to the final clashes of 1945.

name: Tales of Arise: Beyond the Dawn - Attachment Pack
description: The Beyond the Dawn Attachment Pack contains a variety of attachments.

name: Blood Running: Prologue
description: Blood Running: Prologue is a stylish extraction shooter where you'll enter the cyber-wasteland, fight off creatures and bandits, loot valuable gear, and venture into the remnants of a world in ruins. Are you willing to bleed to survive, Blood Runner?

name: The Adventure Story of Yixiu
description: Fantasy RPG that features AP turn-based combat and various RPG nurturing elements, while also offering rich and diverse character storylines that grip the heart.

name: Tatari: Curse Road
description: In this quiet town in the countryside recently a rumor has been spreading. It is said that if you walk alone at night a female ghost calls out to you. "Are you a…***?"

name: Some Assembly Required
description: Build robots, help humans, cause chaos! Some Assembly Required is a sandbox game about designing and building robots to serve the needs of squishy, hapless humans in the world of tomorrow.

name: Unearthed VR
description:
Battle with bears and protect your cubs, become a prowling jaguar, shrink in size to protect your fishy family from marauding piranhas, and even ride beetles into gigantic Amazonian flowers! Unearthed is a funny, impactful and inspirational adventure into the wild like never before, using incredible animal superpowers to find the missing Professor and save the world!

Harness your predator powers, your bow and arrows, and bio scanner in an attempt to complete your vital missions.

Don’t worry, you won’t be alone in this mission. On the journey are your haphazard robot guides, voiced by Richard Ayoade (Soul, The Mandalorian) and Sian Clifford (Fleabag) and the Professor, played by Indira Varma (Game Of Thrones, Obi Wan) as you travel through epic Amazon and Alaskan forests.

These robots will help you collect the animal and plant information you need to find the Professor. They believe she holds the key to protecting these ecosystems and saving the world... the rest is up to you.

name: Toy Monsters
description:
Toy Monsters is a mixed-reality tabletop tower defense game inspired by other classic titles in the genre. Built from the ground up with hand tracking and mixed reality passthrough in mind.

Defend yourself against the hordes across 3 worlds, 33+ levels and bonus levels, bosses, and an endless mode.

As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new toys with unique special powers. You can enhance your toys with magical potions and use crystal power to unleash magic beams from your hands, transform your fingers into flamethrowers, and more.

Defend against hordes of invading monsters by strategically placing magical toy defenders powered by star power. You will encounter a range of enemies, each with their unique abilities and weaknesses.

name: Tropico
description:
Tropico is rich in resources, ripe with potential, and crying out for a leader with extraordinary vision! As El Presidente, transform this untapped pocket of paradise into an industrial powerhouse, a tourist playground and a budding superpower — all under your firm, but fair hand.

Take hold of the levers of power with the Meta Quest’s motion controllers, and lead your people by the hand to a brighter future using custom-built VR interfaces and intuitive gestures.

name: Alpamys
description:
The first Kazakh platformer game consisting of three scenes. The hero of the game (Alpamys) fulfills the quests of Baisyn Sultan.
At the end, it is necessary to defeat the Wizard (Final Stage).

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Mirmiłowo Wielkie
description: The plot of the story focuses on the conspiracy of an evil sorcerer who plans to take over the family town of our heroes. As you can easily guess, the two inseparable friends will quickly decipher his intentions and try to thwart the villain's evil plans. In this chapter of the game, we witness the arrival of a mysterious merchant named Hodon to Mirmiłów. By giving the Castellan a vision of building a stone fortress, the villain quickly ingratiates himself with him, leading to a drastic increase in taxes and sidelining Kajko and Kokosz. However, the fearless warriors decide to regain their former influence and help the Castellan, who is unknowingly getting into more and more trouble.

name: Polytrack
description: Polytrack is a low poly racing game made by the single developer, Kodub, that is inspired by Trackmania. It has a growing community of players and high skill ceiling. It also allows players to create their own tracks to share and play with the community.

name: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek
description: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek is another (after School of Flying ) adventure and arcade game, intended for young computer users (from 6 years old), enabling the players to take on the role of two titular heroes known from Janusz Christy's comics. This time, Kajko and Kokosz set off on a journey to find a medicine that will heal Castellan Mirmił, who was insidiously infected with a cold by evil robbers.

name: Queen Wanda
description: Queen Wanda is an educational and role-playing game that takes you back to the ancient times of Slavic tribes of Wandals and Lechites living in southern Poland. You will be Wanda's detective, a brave and virtuous lah, who has to uncover the mystery of the Wawel Dragon and its summoners.

name: Pagan Gods
description:
Fight against the strongest spirits and gods in the new game from Ino.Worlds! Glory and reward await you!
A game with dark Slavic mythology lore using the beloved 3-in-a-row mechanics (careful, addictive!).

name: Killbeat
description: Killbeat is a rhythm shooter roguelike focusing on fast and brutal gameplay with a wide build variety. Descend into Cadence Drop, a sinkhole devouring an entire city. Fight your way deeper, driven by the rhythm towards the source of the beat. Make music with guns and guts!

name: Riri: Origin of Surabaya
description: For youngsters who have visited Surabaya, surely they already know about the statue of Crocodile and Sharks which is the symbol of Surabaya. According to the community, sharks and crocodiles used to exist. And they love to fight. Exactly as depicted in the statue. What is their story? And is it true that the name Surabaya is taken from that story? Come download and follow the full story in Riri Surabaya and Its Origins.

name: Fairy Tales 4 Kids Interactive
description: "Favourite Fairy Tales for Children" offers eight stories straight from the Slavic folklore and a charming "Catch a Star" minigame. These captivating tales accompanied by a game will surely hold your child's attention:

name: Hauntsville
description: You're a nameless traveler, stranded in a ghost town in the Cursed West. Use your wits, elbow grease, and the iron on your hip. Build a homestead, work the land, and survive against unspeakable monsters in this unique Western horror survival game - alone or with friends!

name: CavEX
description: CavEX, short for Cave Explorer, is a Wii homebrew game with the goal to recreate most of the core survival aspects up until Beta 1.7.3. Any features beyond will not be added. The game has been dubbed by players and fans online as "Minecraft: Wii Edition".

name: Hablon Dawani
description: Before the supreme god, Gugurang turned Dawani into a goddess of rainbow, Dawani lived a simple life in the village of Iraya. Together with Huraw, her loving mother, Dawani would weave colorful and beautiful cloths which they barter with the people in their village. Dawani’s father died a week after her mother heard a raspy chirp from a cricket called “Korokoy” which in superstition, they believe brings death to a love one to anyone who hears it. Dawani heard the “Korokoy” just before a storm started. The storm ravaged their village for days. Determined to put an end to the devastating storm, Dawani decided to investigate by asking villagers about what they suspect is happening, that is where her adventure begins.

name: Tanggal
description: An atmospheric horror game and story-driven experience, inspired by Filipino mythology.

name: Sinag
description:
A mobile 1v1 fighting game that combines the allure of Philippine mythology with deep and engaging gameplay mechanics. SINAG ensures that even newcomers can quickly grasp the basics of combat and start unleashing powerful attacks. However, as you step into the arena, you'll discover a game that is both easy to start and play, yet challenging to master.

SINAG goes beyond delivering thrilling gameplay—it also offers a journey of cultural immersion. Immerse yourself in the vibrant visuals and meticulously crafted backgrounds that pay homage to the beauty and diversity of the Philippines. Experience the essence of

name: The Runes of Kalevala
description: The Runes of Kalevala is a 2D RPG that features local co-op and a story that tells the tales of Finnish folklore and mythology, The Kalevala.

name: City Island 6: Building Life
description: Build the city of your dreams, become the major and take care of your people!

name: Nomad
description: Nomad is a procedural semi-open-world Survival game set in the Asian steppes fantasy world inspired by Altaic and Turkic Mythology. Its gameplay is crafting and resource management as well as story-driven quest-chains.

name: Batyr: The Tale of the Brave
description: An isometric game with a unique combat system, open world exploration, and a setting based on Turkic mythology, built on the Unreal Engine 4.

name: Tarkan: Survivor
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Turkish mythology! Get ready to take a journey into the depths of Turkish mythology with Tarkan: Survivor. This adventure features epic creatures, gods, and unique stories.

name: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go to Die
description: Kalevala: Where Heroes Go to Die is a narrative-driven text-based game inspired by Finnish mythology. It is an alternate continuation to our national epic and an exploration in what gives myths their power.

name: Praamžius
description: Dive into the roots of Lithuania's past with "Praamžius", a base defence game centered around lithuanian folklore. The peaceful life of a farmer village is under threat by hordes of wolves that they must defend against. The player can use village resources to construct defences and pray to various Lithuanian pagan gods to receive special blessings that aide in the fight against the evil.

name: NFLPA Superstars
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Operation Brite Starter pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixelmon Wingull 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Shooter: Lost City
description:
The war to save the Earth is on a full scale, severe fights are all over the planet surface.
Scientists are studying the imminent danger, but the volume of information about the monsters that we have is awfully small.
Nobody knows where did they come from, whether they have leaders and how to stop the invasion...

name: Urusei Yatsura: Dear My Friends
description:
Urusei Yatsura: Dear My Friends, was originally released on 1994 in Japan only, on SEGA CD.
The game is a delightful adventure game that brings to life the iconic characters from Rumiko Takahashi's beloved manga and anime series. This PC port, developed with Adventure Game Studio and translated into English, opens the door for fans worldwide to immerse themselves in the quirky world of the series.

name: Canaan Online
description: Canaan is a free-to-play browser Flash MMORPG set in a fantasy world with Manga-styled graphics. Players choose among 4 unique classes to explore and adventure with, accepting and completing quests, battling creatures, collecting pets, learning and increasing skills, engaging in PvP combat, and even getting married.

name: Sipher Odyssey
description: Step into the sci-fi fantasy adventure of the world of Sipheria, Sipher Odyssey invites players into a matrix-like universe, vibrant animal characters, and a vast saga, offering the excitement of blasting through hordes of enemies with godlike abilities, crafted for the short form content TikTok generation.

name: The Secret of Crystal Mountain
description: Adventure through a land full of mystery and wonder in The Secret of Crystal Mountain, a platforming adventure game about a delivery fox making his way through a magical world. Stranded on a mysterious island, you explore, get to know its residents and uncover its magical secrets. Run around, swim, climb, glide and use the unique abilities of your little bird friend to explore the island and reach the mountain's peak.

name: Grotto Beasts Arena
description:
A digital fan game of the classic TCG.

Play the Solo Campaign and Online Multiplayer with all 200 card effects!

name: Monster Band
description: Sin descripción

name: Animals In The City
description: Sin descripción

name: Singing Horses
description: Sin descripción

name: Singing Easter Eggs
description: Sin descripción

name: Banja Band
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Girls Band
description: Sin descripción

name: Ayse’s Dog Hairdresser
description: Sin descripción

name: Ayse Hairdresser
description: Sin descripción

name: Sue's Chocolate Candy Maker
description: Sin descripción

name: Sue's Potato Farm
description: Sin descripción

name: Pet Grooming Studio
description: Sin descripción

name: Sue's Witch Magic Makeover
description: Sin descripción

name: Net Pet
description: Sin descripción

name: Hunter in the Lost Forest
description:
A little naughty and bizarre Top-down ACT!

Advance through a total of 20 stages while defeating enemies.
The key to victory is to assess the actions of the enemies appearing from 4 directions!
Take aim and draw your bow while paying attention to obstacles such as trees and logs on the map.

name: The Princess and the Pauper: Storybook Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie: Let’s Make Music
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie: Shoe Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie: Puppy Water Sliders
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie: Let's Baby-Sit Baby Krissy
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie as Rapunzel
description: Step into a mesmerizing story filled with wonder in Barbie as Rapunzel game! Help the glamorous princess get ready for her date with the prince!

name: Barbie: Pet Dance
description: Help Barbie's pets start a party to show off their dance moves in the Pet Dance game. Pick a stage and a groovy song, so Lila and the rest can let loose!

name: Barbie's Game Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Barbie: Potty Race
description: Play the Barbie: Potty Race game and become a babysitter for the day! Complete the sister's potty training and do your best to avoid any distractions!

name: Polly Pocket: Polly's Beautiful Bedroom
description: Sin descripción

name: Polly Pocket: Flower Surprises
description: Sin descripción

name: Polly Pocket: Polly Party Pickup
description: Sin descripción

name: Starblind
description: If you like endless runners, you’ll love this game! It’s an epic adventure, set in a beautiful unexplored universe with stunning graphics and awesome music! Navigate through different obstacles such as meteors, spaceships and difficult terrain as you explore the beautiful sceneries space has to offer! So board the spaceship, meet the crew and explore every nook and cranny to find the best photos in the universe!

name: Bally Jump
description: Mobile game with one-touch control where only the best say it's easy to play. Its breathtaking 3D visuals and effects will make you play for hours! For starters, try beating your top score. Then, challenge your friends and compare your record with worldwide players on the ranking list!

name: Vitrail
description:
An evolution of the famous sliding puzzle - the same simple yet addicting formula with a new twist mixed in.

Swipe to move all the colorful stained glass triangles at once. Combine them into squares to remove from the board.

name: night at the meowseum
description: Sin descripción

name: Survivor Master-Sifu
description: "Survivor Master-Sifu" is a roguelike game. You will play as a wandering swordsman and learn various skills and techniques from various martial arts sects in it.

name: CozyCat Simulator
description: Experience a cozy and atmospheric feline adventure in "CozyCat Simulator." Defend your territory or form alliances in this cinematic Victorian world. Engage in dynamic mechanics, from hunting mice to mischievous antics.

name: Carlson's Ticker Simulator
description: With love from Mother Russia!

name: Candy Shop Simulator
description: Dive into a sugary world of sweetness in Candy Shop Simulator! Open your shop, create delectable pastries, manage sales, and expand your candy empire. Satisfy your sweet tooth and build your confectionery legacy now!

name: Ambulance Simulator 911 Emergency
description: Ambulance Simulator is an exhilarating simulation that allows you to become a real-life rescuer and a member of the emergency medical service team. In this game, you'll experience the responsibility and adrenaline associated with working on the frontlines of emergency medical assistance.

name: Relocation Simulator
description: Unpack a World of Relaxation with Relocation Simulator! Ease your stress by helping others move. Dive into the satisfying process of carefully packing, transporting, and unpacking items, all with the simple pleasure of setting up a new home.

name: Road Dinner Simulator
description: Road Dinner SImulator is an exciting cafe management simulation game where you'll become the owner and head chef of a small but cozy cafe on the edge of a picturesque highway. This game allows you to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of culinary adventures and business.

name: Butterfly Simulator
description: Embark on a serene journey with "Butterfly Simulator"! Glide through a dynamic world, unlock stunning skins, and immerse in the beauty of nature. Relax, explore, and transform in this peaceful escape. Welcome to your whimsical retreat in the heart of nature's wonder.

name: Bot Hunt
description: Bot Hunt is a 2D proximity hide-and-seek strategy game. Use an array of weapons and gadgets to outsmart your opponents!

name: Boss Simulator
description: Boss Simulator is a business simulation game with role-playing elements. As a boss, in order to take your secretary to the island and enjoy life as soon as possible, you have to PUA your employees and shape them into overtime machines, making money for you day and night!

name: Block;Shift
description: 3D platformer puzzle game with light horror elements, lonely and surreal atmosphere

name: BlockBawks
description: Learn Python, a real world programming language, by controlling your character with code and solving 100+ challenges in story mode - or test your skills in PvP against friends. If you're stuck, ask someone to join your game and help out.

name: Arcadia Fallen II
