description: In this sequel to the award-winning roleplay visual novel, Arcadia Fallen, you play as a senior student at Seven Wind’s Academy. Choose from three different magical disciplines, and let your choices shape the personality of your character as they navigate school life during a time of great change.

name: Aquis
description: Aquis: A strategic elemental adventure where a human mage, stranded in a mystical world, must collaborate with elemental beings to mend a portal breach. Battle shadow creatures, restore harmony, and seek a path back to Earth.

name: Another Hour Another Planet
description: Explore another world in the community-built spiritual successor to One Hour One Life.

name: An Island Away
description: Set off on a relaxed adventure to explore Dewdrop Island! Climb, glide, and backflip your way around paradise to find the reclusive Island Elder.. but what's the big rush, when there's so many fun locals to meet along the way and fishies to catch?

name: Animal Falling
description: Animal falling is a multiplayer party game featuring cartoon animals in ball form, engaging players in a platform race filled with strategic obstacles and traps to hinder opponents. Unleash your mischief, obstruct rivals, and navigate the chaotic hilarity to victory in this wild, furry showdown!

name: Amo
description: Amo is a top-down metroidvania, where a lost dog, Amo, gets stranded on an island. Explore the vast environments, fight through the enemies of the past, and solve the many mysteries that the island holds.

name: Alonecats
description: Colorful mischief-makers have settled in this valley. Solve puzzles to find them all in a new unique game in the genre of animal search.

name: Maize Mace Maze
description: Dig, grow and harvest plants in your ever-expanding underground maze. Command squads of veggies, plant defensive fruits and upgrade your perishables to better protect against the next onslaught of vicious pests!

name: Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge
description: 'Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge' is a puzzle game where you fill in 100 jigsaw pieces. Can you clear this monumental challenge? The time for the showdown has arrived.

name: Quest of Dungeloria
description: Quest of Dungeloria is a cosy metroidvania set in a dying fairytale kingdom with a non-linear plot. Hardcore action, platforming puzzles and lots of secret areas. Shape the ending with your choices!

name: Illegal Football
description: This is a surrealistic football game. You will form a national football team composed of super heroes, use some unusual ways (such as match-fixing, bribing the refree), and lead them to challenge the top teams in the world to win the world championship.

name: Cooldown
description: [Cooldown] is a rhythm-based defense game. Destroy the endless robot debris flying through space, strengthen your turret, and protect your planet! Develop various technologies and robots to defeat enemies more effectively! Get more rewards while listening to your own recorded music!

name: Fool's Paradise
description: Invited by a stranger to join Fool's Paradise, you'll seek a sense of community without conformity as you make choices that determine to the fate of the commune and all those within it. So, when confronted by division and derision, will you change the status quo or are you content to let it crumble?

name: Crystal Conquest
description: Crystal Conquest is the world's first 3v3 VR MOBA. Choose a class. Become a powerful mage. Topple enemy towers with your teammates. And defeat the crystal guardian to keep the only remaining source of magic out of the hands of evil.

name: Primordial Genesis
description: What a strange dream. I stood in a bloody field in front of a heart that pulsated while floating in the air. I asked him for immortality, and in return, I received infinite versions of myself that died faster and faster every day. I am still living that painful eternal dream.

name: Pieces of the Past
description: 'Pieces of the Past'— a cute, sentimental adventure where you fix and restore family keepsakes, uncovering touching stories. Blend puzzle-solving with the joy of preserving memories in this delightful journey!

name: Lamina Bruise
description: Lamina Bruise is an interactive short story narrated through imaginative technology. Hack a new path, traverse a world divided by inhospitable climate, escape the burning home.

name: Space Pirateer
description: Steer your ship, explore the vast expanse of space, trade for resources, pillage ships and colonies for precious loot. Carry out tasks for various faction governments vying for domination. Would you be a freelancing privateer, or pledge allegiance to a faction and carry out their sinister agenda?

name: Crawler
description: You awaken in an endless cycle of dungeon terror. Armed with basic magic weapons and measly change of coins, you'll amass wealth and unlock limitless enhancements for your arsenal. Do you have what it takes to become a top Crawler slayer?

name: Freelife
description: Co-create a universe teeming with potential in this open world voxel sandbox.Craft a character that reflects your style, race around the city in high-octane vehicles, manage your underground empire or team up with friends for daring operations and thrilling heists!

name: Sunken Shadows
description: A retro FPS roguelike set under the sea. Your soul inhabits an ancient machine. Find the people responsible for your agony. Make them pay. Featuring intense melee combat and fast grappling movement inside of an ever changing dungeon spanning multiple biomes.

name: Permanent Mark
description: This is a zombie style tower defense game that is easy to learn and suitable for all ages.

name: Kickback
description: Kickback is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements, where shooting is the only way to move. Repel waves of mutants, create combinations of weapons and upgrades to optimally navigate the enclosed arena and avoid collisions with enemies.

name: Interwoven
description: Interwoven is a fantasy hack-and-slash centered around the peak of the Hundred Years' War. Join Alrion and Gylfie on a continental journey to escape an elite, rogue task force that seeks to capture them, dead or alive.

name: Patrol Simulator: To Protect and to Serve
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey with "Patrol Simulator: To Protect and to Serve". Experience exhilarating police chases, transforming pursuits into adrenaline-fueled races. Dive into diverse career paths, infiltrate gangs, and collaborate with the SWAT team for an unparalleled gaming experience!

name: Pumpkin Woods
description: Collect magical ingredients and build your cozy witch home while exploring the wonderful sights and secrets of these mysterious lands. Beware though, danger might be lurking deep in these woods...

name: Factory Tower
description: Immerse yourself in the unique experience of rebuilding the towers of the complex with the robot courier and his AI. Solve puzzles, explore mysterious towers and restore Terra's factories to working order. Embark on an exciting journey where every step brings new challenges and mysteries!

name: The Maze of Zabendo
description: You play as Theo Abescar, a detective who is determined to find out what happened to his favorite park and cartoon when he was a child.

name: Riftstrider
description: Riftstrider is a deckbuilding roguelite with a twist - your deck is a 2D grid of orbs. Link elemental orbs to unleash powerful combos while battling foes through ever-shifting rifts in spacetime. Each run is a new adventure.

name: Our Doomed Bunker
description: Our Doomed Bunker is a short 1-4 player co-op puzzle horror game

name: Endless Return
description: Exciting arcade action game where you will fight against hordes of enemies, upgrade your skills, and choose from a variety of weapons and abilities. With each battle you become stronger and unlock new possibilities. Dive into thrilling battles in captivating world of "Endless Return".

name: Gaze of Dread
description: Mary Thorne has booked a week-long getaway at a rental house to escape the distractions of her family so that she can focus on her project. While staying at the house, Valley View Escape, she begins to notice an unnerving presence watching her every move.

name: Atlas of the Starry Night
description: Fly on a broom, fight enemies, unlock new powers, and explore a planet full of secrets and challenges. A twist on the metroidvania genre. Choose your own path and abilities on your quest to collect the fallen stars and return them to the sky.

name: Flyga
description: Be free as a bird, by being a bird. Fly around a vast landscape to explore it's nature and meet its inhabitants, both animal and human.

name: Inexorable
description: Inexorable is a single-player first-person sci-fi shooter narrative set in the year 2133. Navigate and fight your way to the digital heart of the Dark Megalopolis with your AI protégé at your side. Uncover the truth behind the rise of AIs and decide the fate of machines and humans alike.

name: Day Of The Tank
description: Day of The Tank is a retro top down shooter where you have to defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing them all. Fight across multiple destructible levels. Experience old school tank gaming from the 1980s, but with a modern save system!

name: Luffi: Homebound
description: Luffi is returning home from time away at Hartfer's Art Academy. Explore, collect memories and make new friends along the way! Relax and enjoy a wholesome cozy experience as you journey home.

name: Goeland
description: Take off as a mischievous seagull, and soar into a captivating escapade! From playful pranks to selfless deeds, be the ultimate feathered troublemaker or a helpful hero. Solve puzzles, unravel secrets, and engage with an interactive world. Let your wings decide the fate of this charming adventure!

name: Project Down
description: "Project Down" is a 4-player co-op survival game. Uncover mysteries behind Hex Corporation by exploring the map and be cautious, as your mission area has become highly dangerous post-experiments.

name: Core Breach
description: Core Breach is a fast-paced, top-down arcade shooter where you out manuever and destroy anti-virus enemies as a trojan worm. Upgrade your trojan worm with attacks and skills to breach the core.

name: How Old is James?
description: How Old is James? is a game about humanity. Assemble memories through a variety of brain-tickling puzzles and discover a hidden life of the main character, to ultimately answer — what makes us human.

name: Inseedious
description: Free multiplayer roguelite game in Slavic mythological world. Innovative landlords vs players mechanics.

name: Trucking Simulator
description: Experience the thrill and challenges of life on the open road in Trucking Simulator! Strap in, hit the gas, and embark on an immersive journey through the bustling highways and scenic landscapes. Navigate your massive rig through ever-changing road conditions to deliver your cargo safely and on time

name: Penalty
description: Penalty is a 2D Openworld adventure RPG, with unique gameplay mechanics, FBF animations, and beautiful sound and visual effects. Fight your way through with zour weapons and with zour magic, you can use to customize your hero with armor and weapons.

name: Once Upon a Fight
description: The story of your journey has begun to be written. Choose from a variety of different characters, each with unique abilities, in this chaotic multiplayer party game set in magical and fantastical lands. Whether alone or with allies, carve your name in history for eternity in Once Upon a Fight!

name: Galaxy At War
description: Enter the cockpit of your spaceship and prevent the destruction of our homeland! You and your friends have to dodge various attacks and fight many enemies. But your Twitch chat can support you in your defense and your subscribers can even accompany you as wingmen!

name: Hallowed Haven
description: In 'Hallowed Haven,' a pixel art dark fantasy platformer, guide an imp hero and their child through the eerie netherworld. Uncover secrets, meet diverse characters, and find the elusive Hallowed Haven. Will you escape the darkness?

name: Etheral
description: Etheral is a solo ARPG project that aims to be inclusive for those with limited time, while delivering an engaging narrative. Combat is mechanic focused and is Inspired by modern God of War and Hades, while sobering narrative tone is inspired by the Witcher and Song of Fire and Ice.

name: Pollie
description: In a world devastated by an apocalyptic disaster, where once-thriving cities are left in ruins, a lonely robot named Pollie finds itself in a relentless adventure.

name: Primage
description: As the leader of a Stone Age tribe, gather resources, develop your settlement and lead your people through the challenges of a world full of danger and mystery. Your survival skills, strategic planning and decision-making will be key in this battle for survival.

name: Project Cottontails
description: "Project Cottontails" is an interactive narrative adventure in the Manduria Civic Museum. Step into the shoes of Alessio, explore the museum, interact with characters and objects to piece together the story of your ancestor, a famous Allied aviator in World War II.

name: Rogue Sky
description: Master gravity-defying flight mechanics and time-bending powers in this bullet hell rogue-lite where strategic depth meets intense gameplay. Unravel synergistic upgrades and enhancements as you stop the alien invasion from ever happening. Are you ready to dominate the skies?

name: Eko And The Bewitched Lands
description: "Eko and the Bewitched Lands" is a roguelite action RPG game. Help Eko on his mission to save the bewitched lands filled with enemies. Acquire and upgrade weapons of all kinds to combat and discover all the secrets that awaits for you.

name: Sis and Bro The Cyborg Siblings
description: A visual novel RPG where you play as one of two adorable robots and do whatever you want, even if you wanna do nothing!

name: Crops!
description: Crops! is an autobattler in which your fruits and vegetables come alive! Plant your crops in specific patterns and place them strategically to defend against rats, kobolds and even dragons.

name: Junkybots
description: Junkybots is a build-your-combo action roguelike with fighting game mechanics. Prepare yourself to dive into dimensional portals and face countless wave of monsters as you build and upgrade your moves and skills.

name: Kart Them All
description: Face your friends in this frenetic party-game! Dodge attacks with your kart and send your enemies flying off the track with bonus items thanks to its excessive physics.

name: Rental Commander
description: A sci-fi action RTS style game where you drive and pilot the vehicles. Go head to head in a 5 v 5 battle of the ages. Rent and command your squad, but don't expect them to follow orders, they're going renegade the moment you're not in control.

name: Olga: Episode 1
description: Relive Olga's childhood memories as she visits her grandparents' home in Belovodica, a secluded mountain village where some discoveries last a lifetime.

name: BlokhedJelli
description: BlokhedJelli is a 2D platforming collect-a-thon that takes you on an adventure to different worlds; each with its unique theme and strange inhabitants.

name: Door Simulator
description: In case you have ever wondered how to open a door. This game will guide you through the basics of door opening, all the way to its secrets the government doesn't want you to know about.

name: Blockits
description: You appeared in this world, in an empty hub connecting four distinct areas. You don't know who or what you are, and there's just a lot of different levels that can become really interesting and challenging to go through.

name: Anomaly Echoes
description: You're stuck in a loop with your biggest fears. You need to face and overcome your fears to get out of this place.

name: Shrimp Game
description: Become a pilot of a SHRIMP - Submersible Hydrodynamic Research Integrated Marine Platform. Krill your friends, explore areas for loot and customize your SHRIMP!

name: Indies 2: Burning Kindling
description: A turn-based strategy game that combines deck-building and tactical chess. Players control an expedition team consisting of three heroes, embarking on an adventure to find their way home. By scavenging equipment and building decks, players gradually forge their own path of battle。

name: Obsolete Souls Episode 0: Operation Haiti
description: Fight against King Khard and his will in this action packed "beat em' up" prequel to the Obsolete Souls RPG!

name: Grandma Don't Click That!
description: Play as a computer virus destroying grandma's PC. In this unique platformer meets liquid physics simulation you will find yourself flowing through electronics, corrupting files, and evolving with only two goals in mind... spread and destroy!

name: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve
description: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve is a turn-based light meat pigeon game set in the land of aerial fantasy. Choose your current round of battle hunters, battle after the victory to strengthen, until the end of the level, unlock new characters!

name: TheDay
description: Daylight is a post-apocalyptic shooter where players explore ruins, respond to threats, and uncover post-apocalyptic mysteries. Realistic graphics and tense battles to experience post-apocalyptic survival

name: Game Company Simulator
description: Choose a different life to run a game company, and your business can spread across any game-related industries such as game development, engine development, game console development, etc., creating the best game company in your heart.

name: The Swan
description: you were invited to participate in a ballet performance of your best friend, but during the process, you were accidentally involved in a murder. As the investigation deepens, you will get to know the two male protagonists in this work during this period

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - Doors
description: DOORS is coming to Monsters & Mortals!

name: Foundation: Galactic Frontier
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters
description: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC is a new DLC level for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Cosmic Reach
description: A futuristic themed block game

name: Top Down Battlegrounds
description:
Top Down Battlegrounds is a single player 2D top down shooter game which aims on providing a fun top down shooter experience. It allows you to customize your experience with various options, and play the game your way.

Embark on multiple campaigns, where you can personalize the colors of your team and the enemy team as well as your loadout for each mission. Campaign level selection is done through an interactive map, offering both open and non-linear progression. Conquer adjacent territories and choose which levels to attack first.

The gameplay is simple and reminiscent of a top-down version of a first-person shooter. The base game features a limited number of campaigns and weapons, but more interesting content is planned for future DLCs.

name: Neon Rumble
description: In Neon Rumble, players face off in electrifying puzzle-match arenas where skill, strategy, and experience ultimately lead to victory. Clear your board with lighting speed, destroy junk blocks, unleash combo attacks, and activate your Neonite's power to clinch the win.

name: Scuttle Up
description: Scuttle Up is a punishing platformer where you play as a depressed-yet-agile crab. Your journey begins in a boring corporate office, and your mission is to escape the 9-5 and ascend to the top of a mysterious island. A prize worthy of a king crab awaits you at the top, but do you have the resolve to make it?

name: Azur Promilia
description: Azur Promilia is a fantasy world RPG with creature companionship. Step into a fantasy world, utterly different from the world you know. The world of various civilizations, magic and incredible fantasy creatures, together with tales echoing in the starry sky. Take a daring leap from the sky into the ocean, to once again encounter and bond with new life. Guided by shooting stars, amid the sparkling constellations, this is your very own journey. The entire universe eagerly anticipates the ballad of stars and odyssey, exclusively yours to unfold.

name: Fantastic Baseball
description: Fantastic Baseball invites all baseball fanatics to rise up and experience the only baseball game that features the major leagues from around the globe, including MLB, KBO, and CPBL!

name: Arena Worker
description: People run, shoot, and obliterate each other in those battle arenas. Keep this place ready for the next mayhem by cleaning, repairing, and restocking its equipment in ever-changing scenarios. And nobody said that you are gonna do it between the rounds.

name: Gravity Control
description: Gravity puzzles!

name: Kalahari’s End
description: After your plane crashes, You find yourself in one of the largest abandoned tourist locations in South Africa. Build, Craft, and create your character while combatting the intense heat of the Kalahari Desert in this upcoming realistic open-world survival simulation game.

name: Tetra Block
description: relaxed variation of the classic game, offering players more control over their moves. It encourages leisurely shape placement and includes pre-designed puzzle levels for a timed challenge.

name: Corgi Race
description: Be a part of the greatest sport in the world, Corgi Racing! Run your own stable; raise and train your corgi from a promising puppy to a legendary champion with all the twists and turns that come on the track to success.
